thread.title: Cruise Sale Finder reviewed by Graham Breen
thread.title_full: Cruise Sale Finder reviewed by Graham Breen

author: Graham Breen
title: Cruise Sale Finder reviewed by Graham Breen
text: I'm not very good on the computer but I managed to book this all by myself and am very proud of it. The experience was awesome. I had a bit of trouble when I wanted to pay as I clicked the wrong box but I managed to work out how to change it and it was quite easy. Will book like this again.
